# Stunned
## Overview
A stunned creature drops everything held, can't take actions, takes a â€“2 penalty to AC, and loses its Dexterity bonus to AC (if any).

Attackers receive a +4 bonus on attack rolls to perform combat maneuvers against a stunned opponent.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 568
